name: Sparky
description: Sparky is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a member of the WebtrES club. With its cat-like box body and broken screen, Sparky is a charming and charismatic character. Despite its broken screen, Sparky is known for its exceptional dexterity and intelligence. Its ability to manipulate buttons with its hand-down arms and legs makes it a skilled troubleshooter. Sparky's strength and wisdom are average, while its constitution and HP are lower due to its damaged screen. Overall, Sparky is a resourceful and clever robot, always ready to assist its fellow club members.
